lead_paragraph: A year to the day since being seven points from safety at the foot of the Premier League and facing relegation, Leicester City moved seven points clear at the top of table when they beat Southampton 1-0 at the King Power Stadium on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Leicester 'Dreaming' of Title After Win Over Southampton
headline.main: Leicester 'Dreaming' of Title After Win Over Southampton
